mapper.select: SELECT id, date, regdate, food1, food2, food3, food4, food5, food6 FROM food
SELECT id, date, regdate, food1, food2, food3, food4, food5, food6 FROM food where id = #{id}
SELECT id, date, regdate, food1, food2, food3, food4, food5, food6 FROM food order by id desc limit 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food (food1, food2, food3, food4, food5, food6, regdate, date) VALUES (#{food1}, #{food2}, #{food3}, #{food4}, #{food5}, #{food6}, now(), #{date})
mapper.update: UPDATE food set food1 = #{food1}, food2 = #{food2}, food3 = #{food3}, food4 = #{food4}, food5 = #{food5}, food6 = #{food6}, date = #{date}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
